remarks: The domain of the Cantor normal form function (in later lemmas we will use ` dom ( A CNF B ) ` to abbreviate "the set of finitely supported functions from ` B ` to ` A ` ").  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-May-2015.)  Obsolete version of ~ cantnfdm as of 28-Jun-2019. (New usage is discouraged.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
cantnffvalOLD.1 $e |- S = { g e. ( A ^m B ) | ( `' g " ( _V \ 1o ) ) e. Fin } $.
cantnffvalOLD.2 $e |- ( ph -> A e. On ) $.
cantnffvalOLD.3 $e |- ( ph -> B e. On ) $.
cantnfdmOLD $p |- ( ph -> dom ( A CNF B ) = S ) $.
$d A g $.
$d B g $.
